app_detail: U.S. 270 is an electoral map viewer, editor, and historical and news resource. You can use it to explore possible election outcomes for the 2016 presidential race (It takes 270 votes to win) or even create your own electoral map with different candidates. You can also easily share snapshots of your maps. The historical data for all elections in U.S. history can be browsed along with informative links to the candidates. It will also provide live updates of election results on election night.
